Title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
Overview: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet mole within his former colleagues at the heart of MI6.
Tagline: How do you find an enemy who is hidden right before your eyes?
production_companies: StudioCanal, Kinowelt Filmproduktion, Canal+, CinéCinéma, Working Title Films, Karla Films
Cast: John Hurt, Gary Oldman, Kathy Burke
clean_text: tinker tailor soldier spy bleak day cold war espionage veteran george smiley force semiretirement uncover soviet mole colleague heart mi6 find enemy hide right eye drama thriller mystery tomas alfredson john hurt gary oldman kathy burke 2011
